item.title: Democrats, Don't Repeat This Debt-Ceiling Debacle
item.description: Democrats, Don’t Repeat This Debt-Ceiling Debacle In 2011, Republicans held the debt ceiling hostage in an attempt to extract concessions from Democrats. The crisis caused significant economic damage, and it could have been avoided if Democrats had not caved to Republican demands.
